name: ez-gpt-summary
description: EZ-GPT-Summary is a Node.js module for automated webpage summarization. It scrapes a provided URL, leverages the power of OpenAI to select the most relevant parts of the page, and then generates a concise summary of the content. Easy to integrate and use in any Node.js application, it is an efficient tool for content analysis, research, SEO, and more.
author: Waldoh
